channel.title: claire freehafer
channel.description: barebones WIP RSS feed for updates to my website.

item.title: my first rost
item.description: my first rost! a link to another post

content:encoded.p: hello anyone or no one who has subscribed to my RSS feed so far! weird not knowing for certain or not if i am screaming into the void, but also a little exhilerating.
anyway, my first real rost, or RSS-only post, here is i guess technically barely even a post. but more of a post than me only putting "testing" in the content.

it's a link to my new pillowfort account! specifcally a "www wednesday" post, which is something the "bookworm" community there does: a post about what you've recently finished reading, what you're currently reading, and what you're about to read.
so go check it out! or don't! and follow me there if you're so inclined. or don't! i'll never know.

item.title: test post
